Room.Name: On the trail to moria
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard. To the east the wall towers over you and to the west you see the forest of Haon-Dor. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail winds north closely to the wall.

Room.Name: On the trail to moria
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard. To the east the wall towers over you and to the west you see the forest of Haon-Dor. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

Exit.Description: To the north you notice the path makes a turn, following the City wall.
The dusty trail continues towards the south.

Room.Name: On the trail to moria
Room.Description: You are standing outside the northwestern corner of the city wall. The trail leads east following the north wall and south towards the gate.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail winds close up to the north wall of Midgaard.
The dusty trail leads south towards the gate.

Room.Name: On the trail to moria
Room.Description: You are walking on the trail following the outside of Midgaard's northern wall.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.
The dusty trail turns left around the corner of the wall, behind it Haon-Dor.

Room.Name: The long dusty trail following the north wall.
Room.Description: You are just outside the northern gate of Midgaard. You can continue along the trail to the east or west, head onwards to the plains of the north, or enter Midgaard to the south. You can just barely make out the buildings of Midgaard from here, the Temple of Mota looks impressive even from this distance.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.
The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.

Room.Name: Dusty trail along north wall.
Room.Description: You are walking on the trail following the outside of Midgaard's northern wall.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail turns right around the corner of the wall. You notice some mountains in the distance.
The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.

Room.Name: Northeast corner of dusty trail.
Room.Description: You are standing outside the northeastern corner of the city wall. The trail leads west following the north wall and south towards the gate.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail leads south towards the gate.
The dusty trail winds close up to the north wall of Midgaard.

Room.Name: Western Trail Around Midgaard
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard. To the west the wall towers over you and far to the east you see some mountains. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

Exit.Description: To the north you notice the path makes a turn, following the City wall.
The dusty trail continues towards the south.

Room.Name: Western Trail Around Midgaard
Room.Description: You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard. To the west the wall towers over you and far to the east you see some mountains. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

Exit.Description: The dusty trail winds north closely to the wall.

Room.Name: The hills
Room.Description: You are on a small bewildered path winding its way between the hills in lack of better things to do. To the south you have a splendid view over the flat, vast, desolate plains. To the north the hills grow steadily darker and foreboding. This is the cause of no sunset, it is rather the power of evil penetrating these quiet hills. Glancing around you notice only a single bird. The mountains of the dwarven kingdom rise up to your east, you can barely make out the queen's mines from here.

Room.Name: The hills
Room.Description: You are surrounded by dark and sinister hills. Although they seemed fairly small from a distance you now get the feeling that they're closing in on you, towering over you, overwhelming you ... The small path seems to have second thoughts about these hills because it starts winding unnecessarily, turning several times around itself. To the south the hills have a lighter hue of dark. To the north however, the hills have become nightblack holes in the distant mountains.

Room.Name: End of the path
Room.Description: At this point the path has had enough. With a terrified shudder it cowers to the ground, only staying here because you're standing on it. with a slight feeling of unease you look around noticing only a few bushes and a large sign carved into the mountain. You feel you can hear the cry of help from a thousand silent voices all coming from an even darker hole in the mountain to the north marking the entrance to a cave (or a grave :-).

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign says: /---------------------\ | The Mines of Moria! | | | | Four levels. | | | | Watch for mages! | | | \---------------------/ | | | | | | | | | |
Small crippled bushes desperately trying to grow south.

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in a large cave. The ceiling is lost somewhere above the reach of your light. The floor, however, is highly illuminated, your light flickering over several tombstones. Only one is whole, the rest have been shattered by some savage blow. The remaining tombstone looks disturbingly new... A small breeze of fresh air enters from the south (probably lost too). Take a good breath, it may be your last mouthful of air in a long, long time that others haven't breathed before you. To the north a small tunnel continues into the mountain.

ExtraDescription.Description: The stone is inscribed with the unfortunate player's famous last words: "What are you worrying about, it is just a small harmless snake"

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You squeeze your way through a small, narrow tunnel. The sharp-edged rocks protruding from the walls threaten to scratch and cut you. To the south you sense a freshness in the air which is rather unusual in these damp, stuffy tunnels. To the north the tunnel continues.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a part of the tunnel that looks uncannily like the rest except that it goes in a east-north direction. To the north the tunnel widens into a cave.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: This tunnel, leading east-west, seems seldom used. A thick layer of dust covers the floor, making the air stuffy and dry.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are walking in a narrow tunnel. The walls are only roughly shaped, sharp rocks protruding everywhere, even from the floor making you stumble in the flickering light. To the south the tunnel narrows even more making it almost impossible to pass. To the north it slowly widens into a cave. There is a branch of the tunnel going west.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a corner tunnel leading west and north.

Room.Name: The large cave
Room.Description: You are in a large cave, the cave continues east and west, to the south you notice a small tunnel.

Room.Name: The large cave
Room.Description: You are in the east end of the large cave.

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in the south end of a cave, to the south you see a tunnel. You notice a large pile of bones in the corner.

ExtraDescription.Description: Some of the bones are human!

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel.

Room.Name: The hole
Room.Description: You are by a hole in the floor, you can leave down, or north.

Room.Name: The hole
Room.Description: A hole in the floor leads down here.

Room.Name: The damp tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a damp tunnel. Your clothes feel wet. The tunnel continues to the north; to the west you see a hole in the floor; and to the east there is a large cave.

Room.Name: The large cave
Room.Description: You are in the western part of the large cave, to the south you see a damp tunnel.

Room.Name: The damp tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a corner of a damp tunnel. You can go west or south.

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in the north end of a cave. To the east you see many tunnels.

Room.Name: The many tunnels
Room.Description: You are at the intersection of many tunnels.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you also notice a tunnel to the west. From the north you sense the fresh air!

Room.Name: The smelly tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you see a small light to the north. You notice a strange smell from the north..

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in a cave that is filled with fresh air, you sense the wind blowing from the north. To the south you see a small tunnel continue into the mountain.

Room.Name: The light cave
Room.Description: You are in a light cave, through a hole large above you, you see the sky. A small tunnel to the south is the only way out.

Room.Name: The valley
Room.Description: You are in a small valley, surrounded by hills and a mountain to the south. In the mountain there is a cave.

ExtraDescription.Description: Well it doesn't look nice, but it's the only way out.

Room.Name: The foothills
Room.Description: You are on a winding path that leads through the foothills on the other side of the mountain. The path continues north.

Room.Name: The intersection in the foothills
Room.Description: The small path you are following splits here. The path continues north and south or you can follow a trail east into the mountains.

Room.Name: The grassy area of the foothills
Room.Description: The grass here is unusually high. You notice several areas where someone or something large has crushed spots of the grass down. Several very large rocks litter this area. You can go north, west or south.

Room.Name: The foothills end
Room.Description: At this point you are leaving the foothills. You see a plains area to the north of here. You can spot a small city in the distance from here.

Room.Name: The plains
Room.Description: The plains. Exits are south.

Room.Name: The foothills path
Room.Description: Exits are east and west.

Room.Name: Base of the mountain
Room.Description: Exits are east and west.

Room.Name: A trail up the mountain
Room.Description: Exits are east and west.

Room.Name: The mountain top.
Room.Description: Exits are north, east, and west.

Room.Name: The lion's den
Room.Description: Exits are south.

Room.Name: The level foothills
Room.Description: Exits are east and west.

Room.Name: The cave entrance
Room.Description: Exits are east and west.

Room.Name: The hill giant cave
Room.Description: Exits are east.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel turns here, continuing to the east and south.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a narrow east-west tunnel.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are at a turn, the tunnel continues south and west.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are at a turn, the tunnel continues north and east.

Room.Name: The light cave
Room.Description: You are in a cave, to south from you there is a large fire that lights the entire cave, to the east and west tunnels leads off.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels. The only exit is west.

Room.Name: The light cave
Room.Description: You are in a light cave, a large fire in front of you lights the room. The cave continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a tunnel, only exit is to the east. You sense that the tunnel leads slightly down.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a small tunnel, to the west the tunnel continues and to the east you see some light.

Room.Name: The light cave
Room.Description: You are in the south end of a light cave.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are at the eastern end of a tunnel.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

Room.Name: The maze
Room.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

Room.Name: The large cave
Room.Description: You are in the northwest end of a large cave.

Room.Name: The large cave
Room.Description: You are in the northeast end of a large cave. To the north the is a small damp tunnel.

Room.Name: The large cave
Room.Description: You are in the southwest end of a large cave.

Room.Name: The large cave
Room.Description: You are in the southeast end of a large cave. To the east you notice a small tunnel.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a narrow tunnel, which leads both to the east and the south. There is also an exit towards the west, where you see a large cave.

Room.Name: End of tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel stops here.

Room.Name: The hole
Room.Description: You are at a small hole in the floor, you can either leave north or try your luck and leave down into the unknown!

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: Suddenly you feel that the tunnel leads slightly down.

Room.Name: The long tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel is quite wide at this point.

Room.Name: The long tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel becomes narrow to the west.

Room.Name: The long tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel is quite narrow at this point. You notice a small hole leading south.

Room.Name: The long tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel starts sloping down towards the west.

Room.Name: The golden cave
Room.Description: You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden light. The cave continues to the south and west.

Room.Name: The golden cave
Room.Description: You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden light. The cave continues to the south and east, to the north is a narrow tunnel.

Room.Name: The passage
Room.Description: You are in a small passage, it leads south, to the west is a golden cave.

Room.Name: The golden cave
Room.Description: You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden light. The cave continues to the north and west, east from you there is a small passage.

Room.Name: The golden cave
Room.Description: You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden light. The cave continues to the south, east and north.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are at the end of the tunnel.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a small tunnel, it leads from east to the west.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a larger tunnel, it leads from west to east.

Room.Name: The passage
Room.Description: You are in a passage that leads towards the south. To the east you see a tunnel.

Room.Name: The golden cave
Room.Description: You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden light. The cave continues to the north, to the west you see a dark passage.

Room.Name: The dark passage.
Room.Description: You are in a dark passage, that leads east. In the ceiling you notice a small hole, just big enough to pass through.

Room.Name: The passage
Room.Description: You are in a passage that leads north-south. You notice a small light to the south.

Room.Name: The secret chamber
Room.Description: You are in a secret chamber.

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the west and south. To the north a small hole leads to a tunnel.

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the east and south.

Room.Name: The passage
Room.Description: You are in a north-south leading passage. To the south you see light.

Room.Name: The secret tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a secret tunnel that leads west, you feel evilness approaching you as you continue west.

Room.Name: The secret chamber
Room.Description: You are in a secret chamber, the room is filled with an evil feeling.

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: The cave
Room.Description: You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the east and north. To the west a passage leads north.

Room.Name: The passage
Room.Description: You are in a passage, to the east you see a cave. Light from the cave lights up the passage. To the north the passage leads into the darkness.

Room.Name: The dark hole
Room.Description: You are standing at a hole, a small passage leads south. You see some inscriptions on the wall, most of 'em the usual stuff, like: 'Super Snude was here' and 'Why does the mayor likes secretaries with small hands?' - But one inscription gets your attention, it says: The Balrog is ALIVE ...

Room.Name: The small passage
Room.Description: You are in a small passage, to the north you see a hole, and to the south you see a large tunnel. The air is damp in this area.

Room.Name: The tunnel
Room.Description: You suddenly feel that the tunnel leads down.

Room.Name: The large tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a large tunnel leading from the south to the east. The air is damp in the area.

Room.Name: The large tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a large east-west leading tunnel, the air is damp and the floor is wet.

Room.Name: The large tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a large tunnel, the tunnel leads west, and to the east you notice a long tunnel. The air is damp in this area.

Room.Name: The long tunnel
Room.Description: You are standing in a long north-south tunnel.

Room.Name: The wet tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a wet, north-south leading tunnel, the floor is partly covered by water.

Room.Name: The small maze
Room.Description: You are in a small maze, exits leads off to the east, south and west. The floor is partly covered by water.

Room.Name: The small maze
Room.Description: You are in a small maze, exits leads off only to the south and west. The air is damp in this maze.

Room.Name: In the tunnel at the inscription
Room.Description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel, the air is damp. On the wall there is an inscription.

ExtraDescription.Description: It says: Year 631 after the destruction of the dwarven realm. We found the sword of the dwarven king, but it was guarded by a large green dragon. All but two died immediately as the dragon breathed poison gas; we are also going to die soon. Trather and Oralane

Room.Name: The wet tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel. The floor is fully covered by water.

Room.Name: The small maze
Room.Description: You are in a small maze. The floor is mainly covered by water, exits leads north, east and south.

Room.Name: The small maze
Room.Description: You are in a small maze, where the air is damp. Exits leads to the north and east.

Room.Name: The entrance to the small maze
Room.Description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel, and the air is damp. To the west you see a small maze.

Room.Name: In the water
Room.Description: You are standing in water, the tunnel continues both to the north and south.

Room.Name: The wet maze
Room.Description: You are in a part of the maze where the floor is fully covered by water. The maze continues to the north, east and south.

Room.Name: The wet maze
Room.Description: You are in a small maze, the floor is covered by water, the maze continues east, west and south.

Room.Name: The end of the tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel suddenly stops here, only exit is to the west. The air is damp here.

Room.Name: In the water
Room.Description: You are standing in the water, exits leads both north and east.

Room.Name: In the water
Room.Description: You are standing in the water, it continues east and west.

Room.Name: End of maze
Room.Description: You are at the end of the small maze which continues north. Above you a hole leads up.

Room.Name: At the sand bar
Room.Description: You are on a little sand bar in the water.

NPC.name: python snake
NPC.description: It sways back and forth contemplating whether or not to eat you.
NPC.longDescription: The huge python rears its head and hisses at you.

NPC.name: garter snake
NPC.description: It looks harmless enough. Or is it?
NPC.longDescription: A small green garter snake slithers along the floor.

NPC.name: centipede
NPC.description: It looks completely harmless but who knows for sure?
NPC.longDescription: A small centipede here is looking for vegetation.

NPC.name: kobold
NPC.description: It looks ugly enough to scare its own mother.
NPC.longDescription: An ugly kobold mumbles something under its breath.

NPC.name: orc
NPC.description: You notice a slight tinge of madness in his eyes.
NPC.longDescription: This orc is frothing around the mouth. Better stay away.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: orc
NPC.description: The orc says, "Whatcha look'n at?"
NPC.longDescription: This large orc is looking for someone small to pick on.

NPC.name: warrior
NPC.description: He's surely a strong, brainless fighter. Like you.
NPC.longDescription: This tall warrior has more scars than even you!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Warrior AssistAlign AssistRace

NPC.name: warrior
NPC.description: He seems to know his way with weapons. And he wants to show you what he can do!
NPC.longDescription: This veteran warrior is old enough to be your father.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive Warrior AssistAlign AssistRace

NPC.name: hobgoblin
NPC.description: Looking into the eyes of this poor soul makes you feel sad as you see the terror and fear in its eyes. Why don't you put it out of its misery?
NPC.longDescription: A small beat-up hobgoblin cringes in the corner.

NPC.name: snake
NPC.description: A closer look reveals a hungry demeanor. Don't get too close!
NPC.longDescription: A sickly brown snake watches you with caution.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive NoAlign Fade AssistRace

NPC.name: centipede
NPC.description: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.
NPC.longDescription: A white centipede crawls along the cave floors randomly.

NPC.name: hobgoblin
NPC.description: Red, bloodshot eyes and drool dripping from its mouth makes you wonder just how far away you should be.
NPC.longDescription: A large hobgoblin is here wondering if he should tear you apart.

NPC.name: orc
NPC.description: As you already know, orcs have quite a ravenous appetite. Care to be dinner?
NPC.longDescription: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone) to eat.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: lion mountain
NPC.description: Huge claws and big teeth make quite a fearsome opponent for the weary. Are you next?
NPC.longDescription: A mountain lion bears its teeth at the sight of more food.

NPC.name: giant hill
NPC.description: The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall. By his actions you come to the conclusion that he's not very intelligent. A perfect playmate for you.
NPC.longDescription: A hill giant is here tossing rocks around. Marbles perhaps?

NPC.name: mage
NPC.description: This guy can ace the SAT with his frontal lobe tied behind his back.
NPC.longDescription: A small intelligent looking mage is standing here. It looks like he knows his way with magic.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Mage AssistAlign

NPC.name: troll
NPC.description: Whilst you look at this troll, you realize he is trying to figure just how tender you are.
NPC.longDescription: This large mean-looking troll wants to take a closer look at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: guardian snake
NPC.description: You take a closer look at this large snake while it tries to bite your head off!
NPC.longDescription: A large green snake is guardian for something.

NPC.name: thief
NPC.description: Well COUNT your money!
NPC.longDescription: A thief, all dressed in black.

NPC.name: orc
NPC.description: Yrkk.. He belches in your face!
NPC.longDescription: An ugly orc is standing here waiting for someone to practice on.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: centipede
NPC.description: It doesn't seem to pay any attention towards you. You are probably not important.
NPC.longDescription: A small harmless centipede is here looking for some vegetation to eat.

NPC.name: warrior
NPC.description: He doesn't look friendly at all... He is no Mr. Rogers!
NPC.longDescription: A human warrior grins an evil grin in your face.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: kobold
NPC.description: It looks a little sick. Something he ate maybe?
NPC.longDescription: A green kobold hobbles along the cave walls puking periodically.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: bat blue
NPC.description: Bzzzt. Zap. Crackle. Speak about static electricity!
NPC.longDescription: A blue bat flies in circles while electrical charges arc here and there.

NPC.name: bat red
NPC.description: You can definitely feel some heat from this thing. A fever perhaps?
NPC.longDescription: A red bat hangs upside down from the ceiling, glowing.

NPC.name: bat green
NPC.description: Whew! What a stinker!
NPC.longDescription: A green bat flies from wall to wall leaving an awful smell.

NPC.name: bat white
NPC.description: Brrr! You almost can't distinguish this bat from an ice cube.
NPC.longDescription: A white bat rests on the ceiling. You wonder where the cold is coming from.

NPC.name: bat black
NPC.description: Amazing! This bat is grooming itself with acid!
NPC.longDescription: A black bat flies from wall to wall leaving something hissing behind.

NPC.name: thief
NPC.description: He definitely knows what he's doing. Trust him.
NPC.longDescription: A sneaky thief appears and disappears within the shadows.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Thief AssistAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: troll
NPC.description: He looks quite mean. Don't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: A large ugly troll is here mumbling something.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: mage
NPC.description: His little head is buried into his magic books. He'd be very angry should you bother his studies.
NPC.longDescription: A small man is here researching magical incantations.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Mage AssistAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: snake
NPC.description: Sickly brown as it is, you know what it really wants is you for dinner.
NPC.longDescription: A brown snake hisses at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive NoAlign Fade AssistRace

NPC.name: troll
NPC.description: He is so happy, you are disgusted. Kill him now!
NPC.longDescription: A 'small' troll is here happily dancing. Trala-la-la. La-la.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: orc
NPC.description: He is just looking for a fight isn't he?
NPC.longDescription: A large orc growls in your face.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

Item.Name: ring yellow green
Item.LongDescription: A ring, with yellow and green ornamentation. It looks very old.

ExtraDescription.Description: It feels heavy.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: A halfway decayed corpse of a cartographer.

ExtraDescription.Description: Ew. This must have been the mapper that was lost in Moria. His rotted hand still clutches a partially digested map...

Item.Name: coins
Item.LongDescription: A small pile of coins.

Item.Name: dagger rusty
Item.LongDescription: A worn and rusty dagger is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's old and rusted, but it still has a good edge.

Item.Name: bullwhip whip
Item.LongDescription: A coiled length of leather is here...looks like a nasty whip!

Item.Name: club tree huge
Item.LongDescription: An uprooted tree leans against the wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: This is the biggest club you have ever seen! The giant didn't even bother to trim the roots off the end.

Item.Name: furs smelly
Item.LongDescription: A heap of smelly furs sit here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They're heavy and smelly and would probably slow you down...but they do look like good armor.

Item.Name: potion purple
Item.LongDescription: A purple potion is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks rather strange!

Item.Name: helmet metal
Item.LongDescription: A metal helmet is here.

Item.Name: mushroom
Item.LongDescription: A small mushroom is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Let's put it this way - I wouldn't eat it !

Item.Name: dirk
Item.LongDescription: A beautifully crafted dirk is lying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a medium sized, beautifully crafted dirk made from grey alloy. Its blade is double-edged and very thin ... this looks like a good thieves weapon.

Item.Name: axe war
Item.LongDescription: A razor-sharp war axe rests on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: It has an edge sharp enough to cut a passing thought. A good find, this.

Item.Name: sword broad
Item.LongDescription: A well-polished broadsword sits here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's much heavier than a long sword, but not as well balanced.

Item.Name: flail two two-headed
Item.LongDescription: A flail with two heavy, spiked heads is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a stout wooden rod with two spiked balls attached, each weighing over 2 pounds. It's a little worn for wear, but looks most painful.

Item.Name: mace heavy
Item.LongDescription: A large iron mace with a wicked head rests on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: A metal shaft mounted with an iron head, shaped into armor-shattering form.

Item.Name: falchion sword
Item.LongDescription: A curved sword with a heavy tip sits here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's curved like a scimitar, only with no recurved blade and a tip designed for piercing as well as slashing.

Item.Name: voulge polearm
Item.LongDescription: A long polearm with a curved blade is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks a lot like a staff with a pruning knife tied to the end, but it's quite effective.

Item.Name: blade black demon
Item.LongDescription: An evil black demon blade is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Magic AntiGood AntiNeutral Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: You'll become as evil as the weapon, if you use it!

Item.Name: gloves
Item.LongDescription: Some gloves are here. They look like the right equipment for fighting.

Item.Name: scroll ysafg
Item.LongDescription: A scroll which reads "ysafg", it looks very fragile and quite old.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks informative.

Item.Name: slime mold
Item.LongDescription: A green slime mold is here. It smells REAL bad.

ExtraDescription.Description: It wasn't meant to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

Item.Name: slime mold
Item.LongDescription: A green slime mold is here. It smells REAL bad.

ExtraDescription.Description: It wasn't meant to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

Item.Name: staff iron iron-shod
Item.LongDescription: A long staff capped with iron leans against a wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a superb weapon for warrior or mage.

Item.Name: black potion
Item.LongDescription: A thick black potion is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks healthy.

Item.Name: staff oak
Item.LongDescription: A ancient heavy oak staff is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The runes says : Funthark.
You see it has some sort of runes on it.

Item.Name: dagger light silver
Item.LongDescription: A light silver dagger is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like an excellent weapon for thieves.

Item.Name: star morning morningstar
Item.LongDescription: A heavy, spiked morning star is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It's a huge length of wood studded with iron spikes and bands. You wouldn't want to meet this in a dark alley...

Item.Name: map moria second
Item.ShortDescription: a map of the second level of Moria
Item.LongDescription: A rolled up map is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: . * * * MORIA - Map 2 * * * = = =============== = = Maze--Maze | | (Map 1) | Maze--Tunnel* | Maze--Maze--Maze--Maze | Large--Large Cave Cave | | Large--Large--Tunnel--End of Cave Cave | Tunnel *Hole (Map 3)

Item.Name: map moria third
Item.ShortDescription: a map of the third level of Moria
Item.LongDescription: A rolled up map is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: . (Map 1*) Long | Tunnel----Tunnel----Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel | | | Gold--Gold | Cave Cave | | | | Gold--Gold---Passage | Cave Cave | | | Passage--Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel | Dark*---Gold | | Passage Cave | Secret | Passage Chamber | Hole | | | | Passage Secret Large Large Large Small | Chamber--Cave--Cave Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel--Passage | | | | | Passage-----------Cave--Cave | Long | Tunnel Wet Small Small | Tunnel--Maze---Maze Inscription | | | | Wet Small--Small-----Small Tunnel Maze Maze Maze | | | | Wet Wet End of Water Maze---Maze-----Tunnel | | | Water---Water End of Maze* (Map 2)
